title: How to write my first blog post - edunews.tech - Quora

response.answer_text: Things you should keep in your mind before pen down to write for the blog Choose the topic that you want to write aboutDo some research about that topic because you can't dive directly to writeChoose catchy heading so then you'll attract readersMake it simple don't use more fillerWrite like you are writing to kidsJotting down idea relevant to the topic before startEdit Edit EditReplace I with YouAdd some interesting stories in your blogJust remember you're writing to people, not machinesIf you like my answer follow me on linkedin
